name: The GLOCAL Conference on Asian Linguistic Anthropology (CALA) 2021
content: The (SCOPUS / ISI) GLOCAL CALA 2021, The GLOCAL Conference on Linguistic Anthropology 2021 Dates: September 1-4, 2021, Locations: University of The Philippines, Diliman, Cohost: SOAS University of London The (SCOPUS / ISI) GLOCAL AFALA - the annual conference, workshops, lectures on the Linguistic Anthropology, Sociolinguistics, and Language and Society, of Africa. Theme: ‘Symbol and New Society’. Papers: Should discuss the ways in which communication takes on both evolutionary and revolutionary form, following recent significant changes in Asian society, and in Asia’s new and revised interrelatedness across global scapes. Abstract Submission deadline: May 21, 2021\. More more details: https://cala2021.upd.edu.ph/. All papers accepted to the Proceedings will be SCOPUS/ISI indexed.
organizers: SOAS University of London and University of The Philippines Diliman
